Title: The Ministry (Debut)
GameText:
SETUP: Discover (H)-2 Ministry targets
The Ministry is not a target.
After a Ministry target is destroyed, move it under this card.
If there are 5 cards under this card, (flip)
END PHASE: Discover 1 Ministry target.

Title: The Ministry (Graduation)
GameText:
When this card flips to this side, set The Ministry's HP to 80. Remove all cards under this card from the game.
This card counts as Faun, Hayko, Krono, Muman and San.

BOAST: This card deals each Hero target 2 melee damage. Add 1 token to this card.

START PHASE:
Add 1 token onto this card. Then, if there are 5 tokens on this card, the Ministry has succeeded in destroying this timeline. The Heroes lose. Game Over.
END PHASE:
Play the top card of the Villain deck.

Title: Krono
GameText:
BOAST
Bury the top card of the Villain trash. If there are any cards in the Villain trash, Krono deals 1 Hero target X infernal damage, where X is the number of cards in the Villain trash.
END PHASE
(H)-1 Heroes discard 1 card each.

Title: Hayko
GameText:
BOAST
Hayko deals the 2 Hero targets with the lowest HP 2 melee damage each.
END PHASE
Discover 1 One-Shot card.

Title: Faun
GameText:
BOAST
Faun deals the Hero target with the highest HP X toxic damage where X is 1 + the number of cards under this card.
END PHASE
Reveal the top card of 2 Hero decks. Place one under this card, and discard the other.
Quote: "I don't steal people to put into my basement."

Title: Muman
GameText:
BOAST
Put the top card of (H)-2 Hero decks under Muman.
END PHASE 
Muman deals X Hero targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each, where X is the number of cards under this card. Destroy all cards under this card.

Title: San
GameText:
BOAST
Until the Villain START PHASE, redirect all damage dealt to Ministry targets to San. San regains 3 HP.
END PHASE
San deals the Hero target with the highest HP 3 melee damage.
Quote: "Don't call me small! I'll prove you wrong!"

Title: Compare Clocks
GameText:
After this card is played, if Krono is not in play, play the top card of the Villain deck.
After a Hero discards a card, Krono deals them 1 fixed psychic damage.
+1 damage dealt to and by Ministry targets.

Title: My Rocket is Bigger
GameText:
After this card is played, if San is not in play, play the top card of the Villain deck.
After San is dealt damage, he regains 1 HP.
+1 damage dealt to and by Ministry targets.

Title: Can't Escape Your Nature
GameText:
After this card is played, if Faun is not in play, play the top card of the Villain deck.
When Faun would be dealt damage, destroy 1 card under him. If a card is destroyed this way, prevent that damage.
After Faun deals damage to a target, put the top card of the associated deck under him.
+1 damage dealt to and by Ministry targets.

Title: My Lips Are Lonely
GameText:
After this card is played, if Hayko is not in play, play the top card of the Villain deck.
After Hayko deals damage to a Hero target, destroy an Ongoing or Item in that play area.
+1 damage dealt to and by Ministry targets.

Title: Oh Hey
GameText:
After this card is played, if Muman is not in play, play the top card of the Villain deck.
After the first time each turn a card is discarded, place it under Muman.
+1 damage dealt to and by Ministry targets.

Title: Back to the Gym
GameText:
Activate the    BOAST effect of the Ministry target with the lowest HP.
That target regains H HP and deals the Hero target with the highest HP 2 melee damage.

Title: Graduation Speedrun
GameText:
Each Ministry target deals a different Hero character 2 psychic damage. 
Each Hero character deals a different Ministry target 2 psychic damage.
Activate the    BOAST effects of the two Ministry targets with the highest HP.

Title: No Hesitation
GameText:
The Ministry target with the highest HP deals the Hero target with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Activate the    BOAST effect of the Ministry target with the highest HP.

Title: Your Best Pickup Lines
GameText:
Discover 1 Taunt.
If no Taunts are played this way, shuffle the Villain trash into the Villain deck.
Activate the    BOAST effect of the Ministry target with the highest HP.
